item.title: Making Cast Vengeance Through A Command -A little help
item.dc:creator: @Joshinator Joshinator
item.description:
@Joshinator wrote:

Okay i want to make it cast a veng spell through a command

this is it:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("veng")) { if(teleblock == true){ sendMessage("a magical force stops you from teleporting."); } else { if(Vengeance >= 1) { sendMessage("You must wait one minute before activating vengeance again."); } if(Vengeance <= 0 && hitTimer <= 0 && playerLevel[6] >= 96 && PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn] != null) { Vengeance = 120; hitTimer = 10; hitCount = 0; stillgfx(422, absY, absX); startAnimation(1979); txt4 = "Taste Vengeance!"; string4UpdateRequired = true; sendMessage("You activate Vengeance!."); } if(playerLevel[6] <= 95) { sendMessage("You need to be at least 96 magic to activate Vengeance."); } if(!(PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn] != null)) { sendMessage("You must be in combat to activate Vengeance."); } }

My error:

Found: Java JDK 1.6.0_03 Compiling Server, Please wait... client.java:10222: 'else' without 'if' else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("kqueen")) ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
item.source: Making Cast Vengeance Through A Command -A little help
